entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 6.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Bay Airport 08:00 AM EDT Sunday 01 May 2016
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 6.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa rising
Visibility: 48.3 km
Humidity: 37 %
Dewpoint: -7.4°C
Wind: NE 18 km/h gust 29 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2
